titleStmt.title: The doctrine of particular unconditionate election (before time) asserted and prov'd by God's word against the Quakers, papists, and Arminians : in answer to a challenge given the author (by the Quakers) to make good (by the Scriptures of truth) the abovesaid doctrine ... / by Ja. Barry.
titleStmt.author: Barry, James, fl. 1650-1702.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
